content.div:
Sandra Bullock and Brett Ratner would like you to know that they never "hooked up" following the Oscars, even though you probably never heard anything of the sort regarding the Academy Award winner and that dude who was fired from producing this year's telecast. If you had -- sorry, pal. We just outed you as an In Touch subscriber.

In Touch recently published a cover story suggesting Bullock was canoodling, or something, with Ratner. (The lucky guy also features in a magazine photospread with an assortment of his B-list exes entitled "Sandra, No!" – and if you’re curating a Pinterest board labeled “Douchebags,” it comes highly recommended.)

But back to those In Touch allegations -- the ones suggesting Bullock is falling for "a bigger player" than her ex Jesse James: the actress and the Tower Heist director have hooked up since the mag hit newsstands, but only to release an official denial.

"We think that it's incredibly sad that in these times, this magazine would resort to complete fabrication, solely for financial gain," the duo said in a joint statement obtained by Us Weekly. "There is not a shred of accuracy in their story. We have not seen nor spoken to each for over a decade. We both had a great time after the Oscars, just not with each other."

Ten years, huh? So this romance is actually some sort of time-travelling, Lake House scenario?

We kid. As Us Weekly notes, Bullock hasn't had a public romance since her 2010 divorce -- never mind one with Ratner. Besides, she could do better. (Exhibit A: Please, look at this photospread.)

leahc@dose.ca
